content: Those recipes sound amazing, thank you for sharing them. I think I'll try the Strawberry Rhubarb Crisp first. For my spring-themed party, I love the idea of a garden party, and I think I'll incorporate some DIY flower crown stations and a flower-themed photo booth. Speaking of flowers, I was thinking of decorating my apartment with some spring flowers, like tulips or daffodils. Do you have any tips on how to care for them or how long they'll last?
